comment.body:
Мини уточнения по проблеме и времени
![Снимок1](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/72092861-c4ac-4a44-802b-a376506857d4)
![Снимок2](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/0177540f-a4e1-403f-97d0-83853bc537fc)
За это время комп был перезагружен 2 раза, в каждый раз имел интервал простоя в выключенном состоянии по часу, браузер SRWare Iron 125, с ключом на ярлыке **--disable-features=CustomizeChromeSidePanel -incognito**


> Details

который у вас не корректно сработал, а именно не включил инкогнито, а возможно не показал старую панель..
ну вроде ничего не забыл..

issue.title: Gemini app gives "connection was interrupted"
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.6.3

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.android.apps.bard

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Shows the message "Your connection was interrupted, please try again (14)" and has trouble loading recent chats, but after a while still loads them if I reopen the app.

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![Screenshot_20240920_025903_com google android googlequicksearchbox](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/73c9b630-2293-4caa-a0fb-977f5eff8fab)


</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
